name: Claustrophobia (itch) (stratecide)
description:
Move with WASD or arrow keys

Restart level with R

It's not much, but I learned bevy with it, so I'm happy about the result.

The idea is that the medication against claustrophobia also has a calming side effect that doesn't allow you to move as well (speed and jump height). Somehow that also affects the enemies that now don't hurt you anymore.

I learned bevy from this YT tutorial series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVnntJRoP85JHGX7rGDu6LaF3fmDDbqyd

Used libraries:
- bevy
- bevy_ecs_tilemap
- serde
- serde_json

Used Ldtk for level editing

https://github.com/stratecide/claustrophobia
